content: garter rim beanie by sara heckman for apricot yarn & supply garter rim beanie is pictured materials ● worsted weight wool yarn 109 yards for small adult ● needles us 7 16 circular needle us 7 double pointed needles ● tapestry needle bor marker ● gauge 18sts/4 inches on us 7 needles ● cast on for sizes newborn child small adult large adult ● finished circumference 12 5 16 18 21 5 ● this beanie is quite stretchy so the finished sizes may look a bit small how to make beanie with us 7 needles loosely cast on 56 72 80 96 stitches add a bor marker and join for working in the round round 1 knit every stitch round 2 purl every stitch round 3 knit round 4 purl round 5 knit round 6 purl round 7 knit round 8 purl round 9 knit round 10 purl you should have 5 garter ridges round 11 knit every stitch next repeat round 11 until your hat measures 3 5 6 6 5 from the cast on row to the top of your needle decrease section adds 2 5 round 1 knit 6 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 49 63 70 84 round 2 knit round 3 knit 5 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 42 54 60 72 round 4 knit round 5 knit 4 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 35 45 50 60 round 6 knit round 7 knit 3 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 28 36 40 48 round 8 knit round 9 knit 2 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 21 27 30 36 round 10 knit 1 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 14 18 20 24 round 11 k2tog repeat to end of the round stitches remaining 7 9 10 12 round 12 knit to end of the round cut a long tail 12 thread tail onto a tapestry needle weave the needle through remaining stitches and pull tight to close the circle push the needle through the center of the hat to the inside and weave in the remaining end under 8 stitches cut the remaining yarn
